org.openbel.framework.core.namespace
Interface NamespaceService

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultNamespaceService
public interface NamespaceService

NamespaceService defines a service to handle all operations for working with namespaces. The responsibilities entail:

  • Compiling namespace resource locations into operational form
  • Managing the lifecycle of namespace's jdbm btree index
  • Performing value lookups for a namespace resource location

Author:
Anthony Bargnesi <abargnesi@selventa.com>

Method Detail

isOpen

boolean isOpen(String resourceLocation)
Determines if a Namespace resource location is open and available for lookups.

Parameters:
resourceLocation - String, the namespace resource location to check its open status, which cannot be null
Returns:
boolean, the resource location's open status, true if the resource location is open for lookups, false if the resource location is not open

compileNamespace

void compileNamespace(String resourceLocation)
                      throws ResourceDownloadError,
                             IndexingFailure
Compiles the namespace resource into usable form so lookups can be possible. This entails the following:
  1. Resolve the namespace resource location to the cache.
  2. Build a jdbm btree index for the cached namespace resource.

Parameters:
resourceLocation - String, the namespace resource location to compile which cannot be null
Throws:
ResourceDownloadError - Thrown if the namespace resource could not be downloaded
IndexingFailure - Thrown if an error occurred while indexing the namespace
InvalidArgument - Thrown if the resourceLocation argument is null

lookup

String lookup(Parameter p)
              throws NamespaceSyntaxWarning,
                     IndexingFailure
Lookup and return the namespace value for the Parameter's associated Namespace. The jdbm btree index uses the namespace value as the entry key and the namespace value encoding as the entry value.

Parameters:
p - Parameter, the parameter to lookup the namespace value for which cannot be null
Returns:
String the namespace value encoding for the namespace value of the parameter, or an empty string if the namespace value encoding is blank, or null if:
  • The Parameter has a null namespace.
  • The Parameter's namespace value is not in the index.
    • Throws:
    NamespaceSyntaxWarning - Thrown if the Parameter.getValue() is not found in its declared namespace
    IndexingFailure - if the namespace is not already open
    InvalidArgument - Thrown if p argument is null, its value is null, or if its namespace's resource location is null

search

Set<String> search(String resourceLocation,
                   Pattern pattern)
                   throws IndexingFailure,
                          ResourceDownloadError
Perform a search on the values in namespace specified by the resource location, namespace does not have to be open prior to calling this.

Parameters:
resourceLocation - resource location, e.g., "http://resource.belframework.org/belframework/1.0/ns/chebi-ids.belns" , can not be null
pattern - Pattern, can not be null
Returns:
Set of Strings containing values that match
Throws:
ResourceDownloadError - Thrown if the namespace resource cannot be downloaded when compilation is necessary
IndexingFailure - Thrown if an index could not be opened for a resource location

verify

void verify(Parameter p)
            throws NamespaceSyntaxWarning,
                   IndexingFailure,
                   ResourceDownloadError
Verify that the Parameter's value exists in its defined namespace index.

This call will automatically open the namespace index if needed. If the namespace index cannot be opened for lookups then it is assumed that it does not exist. In this case the namespace resource is downloaded, cached, compiled into an index, and opened for use by this call.

Parameters:
p - Parameter, the parameter to verify that its value is defined in its namespace index
Throws:
NamespaceSyntaxWarning - Thrown if the Parameter.getValue() is not found in its declared namespace
IndexingFailure - Thrown if an index could not be opened for a resource location
ResourceDownloadError - Thrown if the namespace resource cannot be downloaded when compilation is necessary
InvalidArgument - Thrown if p argument is null, its value is null, or if its namespace's resource location is null

verify

void verify(Statement s)
            throws SymbolWarning,
                   IndexingFailure,
                   ResourceDownloadError
Verify all parameters of Statement s. If at least one parameter could not be found in its namespace index then a SymbolWarning is thrown to capture which parameters failed.

This call will automatically open the namespace index if needed. If the namespace index cannot be opened for lookups then it is assumed that it does not exist. In this case the namespace resource is downloaded, cached, compiled into an index, and opened for use by this call.

Parameters:
s - Statement, the statement containing the parameters to verify, which cannot be null
Throws:
SymbolWarning - Thrown if at least one parameter could not be found in its namespace index
IndexingFailure - Thrown if an index could not be opened for a resource location
ResourceDownloadError - Thrown if the namespace resource cannot be downloaded when compilation is necessary
InvalidArgument - Thrown if the Statement s is null

verify

void verify(Document d)
            throws SymbolWarning,
                   IndexingFailure,
                   ResourceDownloadError
Verify all parameters of Document d. If at least one parameter could not be found in its namespace index then a SymbolWarning is thrown to capture which parameters failed.

This call will automatically open the namespace index if needed. If the namespace index cannot be opened for lookups then it is assumed that it does not exist. In this case the namespace resource is downloaded, cached, compiled into an index, and opened for use by this call.

Parameters:
d - Document, the document containing the parameters to verify, which cannot be null
Throws:
SymbolWarning - Thrown if at least one parameter could not be found in its namespace index
IndexingFailure - Thrown if an index could not be opened for a resource location
ResourceDownloadError - Thrown if the namespace resource cannot be downloaded when compilation is necessary
InvalidArgument - Thrown if the Document d is null
